bibl.title: P. Vindob. G 31701 verso: A Prefectural (?) Hypographe.
bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 31701 verso [recto = S.B. XX, 14229]. Instruction (in the form of a hypographe) to a woman to petition the dikaiodotes Aurelius Apolinarius. Provenance unknown, ca. 260-300 A.D. - Pp. 92-96: Dikaiod√ítai in Roman Egypt [update of: F. ELIA, I 'Iuridici Alexandreae', Studia in memoria di Santo Mazzarino. III = QC 2 (1990) pp. 185-216]. - Pp. 97-102: Appendix. The Chronology of the Drusilla Lawsuit. <dikaiodotai>
bibl.seg: KRUIT Nico and Klaas A. WORP, P. Vindob. G 31701 verso: A Prefectural (?) Hypographe.
